page.title: 08Blythe Colours-Products
page.content:
Blythe Colours, situated in Cresswell, Stoke-on-Trent, is a factory which makes colours. In fact it makes 25,000 colours. They are used for many different things. A few examples are for pottery, glass, plastics and cement. Blythe Colours also makes coloured plastic beads for injection moulding. Other products include colour for the paint industry and glazes for use on tableware, wall and floor tiles and art and decorative ware.
Blythe colours is an important industry both locally and nationally.
